trans-unit.source: Full absolute Path to binary:The binary to use for PDF generation on CLI. Grep it with $ which wkhtmltopdf
TypeNum to use:The configured TypeNum has to be called to generate the PDF.
URL Extension to remove:Extensions like realurl can map the typeNum to something else like ".pdf". Configure this, so we can use the url.
List of allowd url parameters:All others are removed for security.
